description: This header file defines the ICapture interface within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It declares a virtual interface for capturing and storing screen data, including an embedded IStore interface for image data storage and a static method to obtain an ICapture instance.

classes.name: ICapture
classes.description: A virtual interface for capturing screen data, including a method to retrieve the capture name, perform capture with a provided store, and access an ICapture instance.

classes.name: ICapture::IStore
classes.description: An interface for storing image data, providing a method to process raw buffer data into a specific format.

methods.name: ICapture::IStore::R8_G8_B8_A8
methods.description: Processes raw image buffer data, formatted as RGBA, with specified width and height.

methods.name: ICapture::Name
methods.description: Returns the name identifier of the capture instance.

methods.name: ICapture::Capture
methods.description: Performs the screen capture, storing the result through the provided IStore instance.

methods.name: ICapture::Instance
methods.description: Provides access to a singleton instance of the ICapture interface.

ctags.name: ICapture
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ICapture : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
